response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. This item is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I am offering this masterpiece to you at a special price of $750,000. I believe its worth far exceeds this amount, but I am confident that you will find its value to be even greater than what I am asking. I look forward to discussing the details with you and potentially making this exceptional piece yours.", "product_price": 750000}
